resources.string: Incrementer provides multiple implementations of a simple counter app to demonstrate how various state saving mechanisms do and do not fully handle various Activity recreation events.
These implementations are valid approaches that you should use in your app to persist application state across activity recreations.

These implementations do not fully handle all cases that can cause your Activities to restart. None of these approaches handle process death, and only some of them make any attempt to retain state if the Activity gets recreated.
